root.name: Deca Sports Extreme
root.description: Deca Sports Extreme is part of the Deca Sports franchise coming to the Nintendo 3DS in the summer of 2011 which will be released by Hudson. The game will feature 10 sport events all playable in 3D. Deca Sports Extreme will feature: Soccer Tennis Basketball Ice Hockey Snowball Fight Sumo Wrestling Bowling Snowmobile Racing Sport Blowgun Trampoline Each event will have the possibility to collect power-ups to unleash special moves. Deca Sports Extreme can be played with four players with wireless play or download. Players are able to customize their team and choose a variety of venues.
